start.state: Strip poker? It beats Insult Beer Pong, I suppose.

case.state: Sorry, dear. I promise you'll look just as darling without it.
What is a fine lady like you doing in a place like this?
No offense, but why did a lady like you show up at the Inventory?
Aren't you excited, Elizabeth?
Elementary, my dear Elizabeth.
You face is all red. How cute.
You can't act too surprised. That is the risk you run when you come here.
Oh, I am playing with a French girl today.

state.i: J'espere que vous ne devenez pas nerveux.

case.state: Winslow, buy Marinette a drink on my tab.
Well, well, well... Looks like we have two pirates at the table tonight.
Which seas are you sailing in? It better not be the Caribbean.
Don't be so shy, Meia. Smile a little.
Wait, you are a space pirate?
Let's see what a "Space Pirate" looks like all natural.
You lost umm... Metroid, was it?
We are on good terms, right, um... Samus?
I will defeat this salty sea wench.
What do you mean, you won't kick her out? You know how I feel about ghosts, Winslow.
Why am the only one who wants to get rid of this thing?
Strip for us all, you monster.
All right, lassie time to strip.
Another loss for you, Yang.
Well shiver my timbers.
I really want to see what the size of your treasure chest is.
I really want to see what the size of your treasure chest is.
I really want to see what the size of your treasure chest is.
I really want to see what the size of your treasure chest is.
I really want to see what the size of your treasure chest is.
I really want to see what the size of your treasure chest is.
Last pieces of the puzzle.
Finally, something worth looking at!
I knew you couldn't keep quiet forever.
It's just your ~clothing~, ~name~, no need to be shy.
It's not every day I am in this fine company. I hope my manners are proper.
Why are you giving me such a cold shoulder?
Not bad, ~name~. You could give Guybrush a run for his pieces-o'-eight.
Now that is a fine cutlass you have, lad.
To repay you for today's sights, of course.
But I guess you are no ordinary lady.
Whoops, did I say that out loud?
Don't act so nervous. You chose to come here.
What sort of voodoo spells do you use to create your costume?
No match, but they still look good.
Well, besides the fact that you are standing in your underwear.
Of course you were wearing something underneath that suit.
It looks more like pajamas to me.
I really wish I had some voodoo root bear right now.
That's the second biggest penis I've ever seen!
Finally time to open the lid on this treasure chest.
I know plenty of pirates who would have a field day around these parts.
I apologize for my lack of empathy. But I was really looking forward to this.
Why do the French always lose so badly?
Impressive ye don't even protest.
You should have become a pirate instead.
Do they teach you how to handle situations like this in your federation?
The sooner you lose, the better.
Take those improper undergarments off.
Well, perhaps it isn't hot enough today.
Guess you will have to strip for us instead.
Sooner or later you will have to break the silence.
Same old story!
I'm sure we can get you to speak eventually.
I haven't seen a man raise his own mainsail for too long.
This might be a good time to go quiet, Link.
Make sure your pearl is polished well.
What are you going to take off, ~name~?
This reminds me of my time on Booty Island.
No offense, but you properly wouldn't survive a day as a buccaneer.
And you look so cute in your birthday suit.
I still could use a pirate like you on me ship.
No bounty hunter will ever take down Elaine Marley.
You never know when you will stand completely naked in front of strangers.
Hope you feel humiliated by this.
There's is a booty I would love to get my hands on.
Skilled laborers are hard to come by these days! ...Pun unintended, I assure you.
I always wanted to see a real lady doing this.
Not to rub it in, but a French lost to a Brit yet again.
Well, unless your sword fighting skills are as good as your poker skills.
Does that mean I am the first pirate that has managed to beat you?
Do they still pleasure themselves in your beloved federation?
Finish quickly and get out of here.
At least this is better than losing an arm, right?
Remind me to buy you a root beer sometime, ~name~.
No need to go full sail, we've got plenty of time!

state.i: Bonjour Marinette, bienvenue the Inventory. J'espere que nous aurons unsuper match.

case.state: Ready for another round, ladybug?
Perhaps you could even explain that weird eyepatch you were wearing.
Bounty hunter... gulp.
My husband lost his hand to one.
What kind of magic do you use?
Stay away from me, ghost.
Maybe you should join me and Guybrush on our next adventure.
Be a proper lady and find some better socks next time.
You should be more careful. Those things are dangerous.
To repay you for today's sights, of course.
Skilled laborers are hard to come by these days! ...Pun unintended, I assure you.
Some hero you turned out to be.
Brings back memories of the swarthy pirates down at the Scumm Bar.
Cheer up! Your chest looks great.
That's the second biggest pair of boobs I've ever seen!
Woah, those coconuts are bigger than I expected.
I bet you wish you had put on some proper underwear right now.
Time to take it off, ~name~.
All right laddie, time to strip.
Still don't feel like talking, huh?
Did you say something, Link?
Got you.
Let's see how much courage you truly have.
I haven't seen a woman swab her own deck for too long.
The rules are very clear, ye better not try to get out of this.
Desolé... mais tu as perdu, Marinette.
We should have a proper pirate duel sometime.
Told you I would beat you.
Well then, officer, you lost.
You lost, finally.
Next time, try strip arm wrestling.
What are you going to take off, ~name~?
What an adorable little life preserver!
Are you under a voodoo curse or something?
Bah! Just another landlubber.
Just your ~clothing~? 'Tis a shame.
A man of few words, eh?
Well done! Now, grab a mop and get busy. A tidy ship is an efficient ship!
Well, I guess you truly are a sword master.
Oh, you remind me of when I was just a girl!
Small pearls, but pearls are still nice to look at.
Just you wait, she will try and kill us or worse in a moment.
Those are worth their weight in Spanish doubloons!
You didn't wear a bra under that corset, tsk tsk.
Never mind, let's just focus on the game.
I didn't know cannonballs got that big.
Taking off your ~clothing~, are you?
My French is a little rusty. I hope I don't offend you too much, Marinette.
A shame, that jacket look good on you.
We should definitely have a drink together later.
What did you say you did for a living?
No offense, but I have a hard time trusting bounty hunters.
Wait, you can talk to other people with that thing?
A knife... I knew you were up to no good.
You look like a real swashbuckler, Yang.
Is it that hard to find socks with the same length?
Wait are those gauntlets guns?
Good game. Too bad you fought like a cow!
Remind me to buy you a root beer sometime, ~name~.
Usually the ladies I come across won't wear pink in fear of looking immature.
I know I am excited to see you undress.
You face looks so cute when you strip.
What the... what kind of magic is this?
Let's see if you wear a matching pair of underwear.
You are a pirate, the best possible profession. What do you have to complain about?
Why do you space people always wear these those one-piece suits?
Is that a standard uniform where you are from?
I have very bad experience with ghosts being jackasses.
The heat of the Caribbean has a way of getting to you, doesn't it?
I would suggest a round of insult sword fighting, but that would require you to speak.
Guess not.
Well done! Now, grab a mop and get busy. A tidy ship is an efficient ship!
You should do this more often.
C'était divertissant.
If it makes you feel any better, I would still like that drink later, Meia.
You should do that again. I have never seen anything like it.
I wish more admirals would put on a show like this.
The minute this game is over I will order a root beer.
You were on fire.
No need to be shy; you don't have anything I haven't seen before.
Let's see what you are hiding under those.
That one is going to be hard to put back on again.
I want to see what treasure we're hiding.
How do you even sail around in space?
Let's see what kind of treasure you are hiding, bounty hunter.
I'm telling you, ghosts are not trustworthy.
You don't have an undershirt or anything underneath?
Keep that mast erect!
Just a bauble, but it brings us closer to the treasure!
But then again, I guess proper manners really don't matter in a game like this.
You know, you might just be the most depressing pirate I have ever seen.
You know, you might just be the most depressing pirate I have ever seen.
At last, time for a sword fight! Unsheathe whatever you've got under there.
I love it when men strip for me.
You play like a dairy farmer!
I once owned a dog that was smarter than you.
Every word you say to me is stupid.
A ghost! Why did you invite a ghost here, Winslow?
Not exactly my cup of tea...
I'm rubber; you're glue.
A ghost! Why did you invite a ghost here, Winslow?
How about ~cards~ this time?
Give me... ~cards~.
~cards~, and I won't even run you through.
I've got a little tip for you. Get the point?
A ghost! Why did you invite a ghost here, Winslow?
I miss my ~clothing~ already...
I must be more out of practice than I thought.
I hope I won't come to regret playing this game.
I've had this bandana for years, so I'll want it back later.
I was blindsided by that one.
Sorry, dear. I promise you'll look just as darling without it.
What is a fine lady like you doing in a place like this?
No offense, but why did a lady like you show up at the Inventory?
Aren't you excited, Elizabeth?
Elementary, my dear Elizabeth.
You face is all red. How cute.
You can't act too surprised. That is the risk you run when you come here.
Oh, I am playing with a French girl today.

We are on good terms, right, um... Samus?
I will defeat this salty sea wench.
What do you mean, you won't kick her out? You know how I feel about ghosts, Winslow.
Why am the only one who wants to get rid of this thing?
Strip for us all, you monster.
All right, lassie time to strip.
Another loss for you, Yang.
Well shiver my timbers.
Last pieces of the puzzle.
Finally, something worth looking at!
I knew you couldn't keep quiet forever.
It's just your ~clothing~, ~name~, no need to be shy.
It's not every day I am in this fine company. I hope my manners are proper.
Why are you giving me such a cold shoulder?
Not bad, ~name~. You could give Guybrush a run for his pieces-o'-eight.
Now that is a fine cutlass you have, lad.
To repay you for today's sights, of course.
But I guess you are no ordinary lady.
Whoops, did I say that out loud?
Don't act so nervous. You chose to come here.
What sort of voodoo spells do you use to create your costume?
No match, but they still look good.
Well, besides the fact that you are standing in your underwear.
Of course you were wearing something underneath that suit.
It looks more like pajamas to me.
I really wish I had some voodoo root bear right now.
That's the second biggest penis I've ever seen!
Finally time to open the lid on this treasure chest.
I know plenty of pirates who would have a field day around these parts.
I apologize for my lack of empathy. But I was really looking forward to this.
Why do the French always lose so badly?
Impressive ye don't even protest.
You should have become a pirate instead.
Do they teach you how to handle situations like this in your federation?
The sooner you lose, the better.
Take those improper undergarments off.
Well, perhaps it isn't hot enough today.
Guess you will have to strip for us instead.
Sooner or later you will have to break the silence.
Same old story!
I'm sure we can get you to speak eventually.
I haven't seen a man raise his own mainsail for too long.
This might be a good time to go quiet, Link.
Make sure your pearl is polished well.
What are you going to take off, ~name~?
This reminds me of my time on Booty Island.
No offense, but you properly wouldn't survive a day as a buccaneer.
And you look so cute in your birthday suit.
I still could use a pirate like you on me ship.
No bounty hunter will ever take down Elaine Marley.
You never know when you will stand completely naked in front of strangers.
Hope you feel humiliated by this.
There's is a booty I would love to get my hands on.
Skilled laborers are hard to come by these days! ...Pun unintended, I assure you.
I always wanted to see a real lady doing this.
Not to rub it in, but a French lost to a Brit yet again.
Well, unless your sword fighting skills are as good as your poker skills.
Does that mean I am the first pirate that has managed to beat you?
Do they still pleasure themselves in your beloved federation?
Finish quickly and get out of here.
At least this is better than losing an arm, right?
Remind me to buy you a root beer sometime, ~name~.
No need to go full sail, we've got plenty of time!

state.i: Bonjour Marinette, bienvenue the Inventory. J'espere que nous aurons unsuper match.

case.state: Ready for another round, ladybug?
Perhaps you could even explain that weird eyepatch you were wearing.
Bounty hunter... gulp.
My husband lost his hand to one.
What kind of magic do you use?
Stay away from me, ghost.
Maybe you should join me and Guybrush on our next adventure.
Be a proper lady and find some better socks next time.
You should be more careful. Those things are dangerous.
To repay you for today's sights, of course.
Skilled laborers are hard to come by these days! ...Pun unintended, I assure you.
Some hero you turned out to be.
Brings back memories of the swarthy pirates down at the Scumm Bar.
Cheer up! Your chest looks great.
That's the second biggest pair of boobs I've ever seen!
Woah, those coconuts are bigger than I expected.
I bet you wish you had put on some proper underwear right now.
Time to take it off, ~name~.
All right laddie, time to strip.
Still don't feel like talking, huh?
Did you say something, Link?
Got you.
Let's see how much courage you truly have.
I haven't seen a woman swab her own deck for too long.
The rules are very clear, ye better not try to get out of this.
Desolé... mais tu as perdu, Marinette.
We should have a proper pirate duel sometime.
Told you I would beat you.
Well then, officer, you lost.
You lost, finally.
Next time, try strip arm wrestling.
What are you going to take off, ~name~?
What an adorable little life preserver!
Are you under a voodoo curse or something?
Bah! Just another landlubber.
Just your ~clothing~? 'Tis a shame.
A man of few words, eh?
Well done! Now, grab a mop and get busy. A tidy ship is an efficient ship!
Well, I guess you truly are a sword master.
Oh, you remind me of when I was just a girl!
Small pearls, but pearls are still nice to look at.
Just you wait, she will try and kill us or worse in a moment.
Those are worth their weight in Spanish doubloons!
You didn't wear a bra under that corset, tsk tsk.
Never mind, let's just focus on the game.
I didn't know cannonballs got that big.
Taking off your ~clothing~, are you?
My French is a little rusty. I hope I don't offend you too much, Marinette.
A shame, that jacket look good on you.
We should definitely have a drink together later.
What did you say you did for a living?
No offense, but I have a hard time trusting bounty hunters.
Wait, you can talk to other people with that thing?
A knife... I knew you were up to no good.
You look like a real swashbuckler, Yang.
Is it that hard to find socks with the same length?
Wait are those gauntlets guns?
I won! Now there's something I hardly ever hear Guybrush say.
Remind me to buy you a root beer sometime, ~name~.
Usually the ladies I come across won't wear pink in fear of looking immature.
I know I am excited to see you undress.
You face looks so cute when you strip.
What the... what kind of magic is this?
Let's see if you wear a matching pair of underwear.
You are a pirate, the best possible profession. What do you have to complain about?
Why do you space people always wear these those one-piece suits?
Is that a standard uniform where you are from?
I have very bad experience with ghosts being jackasses.
The heat of the Caribbean has a way of getting to you, doesn't it?
I would suggest a round of insult sword fighting, but that would require you to speak.
Guess not.
Well done! Now, grab a mop and get busy. A tidy ship is an efficient ship!
You should do this more often.
C'était divertissant.
If it makes you feel any better, I would still like that drink later, Meia.
You should do that again. I have never seen anything like it.
I wish more admirals would put on a show like this.
The minute this game is over I will order a root beer.
You were on fire.
No need to be shy, you don't have anything I haven't seen before.
Let's see what you are hiding under those.
That one is going to be hard to put back on again.
I want to see what treasure we're hiding.
How do you even sail around in space?
Let's see what kind of treasure you are hiding, bounty hunter.
I'm telling you, ghosts are not trustworthy.
You don't have an undershirt or anything underneath?
Keep that mast erect!
Just a bauble, but it brings us closer to the treasure!
But then again, I guess proper manners really don't matter in a game like this.
You know, you might just be the most depressing pirate I have ever seen.
At last, time for a sword fight! Unsheathe whatever you've got under there.
I love it when men strip for me.
I've spoken to apes more polite than you.
You can't match my witty repartee!
Relax, Elaine...
I'm shaking, I'm shaking.
How about ~cards~ this time?
Give me... ~cards~.
~cards~, and I won't even run you through.
Curse these cards to the bottom of the ocean!
I may as well dispense with the vest, also, seeing as I didn't bring my guns, either.
I feel like punching someone.
Who's dealing these cards - Stan?
Only Guybrush has ever succeeded before in getting me out of my pants... you should feel lucky.
At least I'm still several knots ahead.
Rules are rules, ~name~.
What is a fine lady like you doing in a place like this?
No offense, but why did a lady like you show up at the Inventory?
Aren't you excited, Elizabeth?
Elementary, my dear Elizabeth.
You face is all red. How cute.
You can't act too surprised. That is the risk you run when you come here.
Oh, I am playing with a French girl today.
